attributes.action: All children to re-take one year of education to allow for curriculum catch up.
attributes.additional_details: I propose that all children get to re take one year of education.  Catching up on what they have missed.
attributes.background: Children have missed out on a huge chunk of teacher lead curriculum.  Many familys struggling with the concept of home learning whilest trying to work from home . The catch up of education missed from school is phenomenal.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160

Give current yr 11 & 13 students the option to repeat the year to improve grades
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565720
